channel.title: ebisu on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in ebisu on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Meguro Housing Complex
item.description: There are a seemingly infinite variety of housing projects in Tokyo that are each fascinating and captivating in their design and detail. It would be nice to see some from the inside one day. This one, in Meguro Ward, is as seen from the Ebisu Garden Place, a landmark which has a great platform from which to view the four Wards of Minato, Shibuya, Shinagawa and Meguro.
